[ C ] a child who is regularly absent from school without permission: Police reports showed that the vast majority of crime committed by children was carried out by truants. play truant UK (US usually play hooky)
to be regularly absent from school without permission: play truant from school Most parents are horrified when they discover their children have been playing truant from school.
